attributes.action: put an end to the cuts and closures currently affecting community hospital services.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Since 1999 over 3000 beds have been lost from Community Hospitals across the country.  There are just over 300 Community Hospitals in England, of which 168 are under review or threatened with closure and loss of services.  The Government is patently failing to live up to the promises in its Jan 2006 White Paper, "Our health, our care, our say" where it re-iterated its support for these vital community services.
